00126     protected: virtual void      toStringStream (ostringstream &str) const;
00127     public:    virtual string    getPacketValid (bool strict, int32_t length) const {
00128       return BasicCommandPacket::getPacketValid(strict, length);
00129     }
00130     public: virtual inline void setPacketType (PacketType t) {
00131       if (t != PacketType_Command) {
00132         throw VRTException("Can not change packet type to non-Command type when using BasicControlPacket");
00133       }
00134       BasicVRTPacket::setPacketType(t);
00135     }

00137     // TODO - what new things need to be reset? if nothing, don't re-implement

00152     // BasicVRTPacket originally provides this method, which returns true always,
00153     // as is appropriate for BasicCommandPacket.
00154     // IndicatorFieldProvider also provides this method, but returns value of Change Indicator
00155     // as is appropriate for BasicContextPacket.
00156     // BasicControlPackets should default to BasicContextPacket's implementation; ensure that here.
00157     public: virtual bool isChangePacket () const {
00158       return BasicContextPacket::isChangePacket();
00159     }

00170     }
